definition: eigenvalue (math.)/also written 特徵值|特征值
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
4th note in pentatonic scale 五音[wu3 yin1], roughly sol/see also 徵|征[zheng1]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: This is an extended application of the boundary element method in electromagnetic field eigenvalue problem.
sentences.chinese: 這是邊界元算法在波導本徵值問題中的深入應用。

sentences.english: The corresponding energy eigenvalues and exact electron eigenfunctions are deduced.
sentences.chinese: 給出了相應的能量本徵值和嚴格的電子波函數。

sentences.english: In this paper, the oil film force of finite journal bearing is obtained using averaging natural value method.
sentences.chinese: 利用平均本徵值法求得有限寬軸承的油膜力。
